private final class LoopTransformator.Transformator

The visitor performing the actual loop transformation in the BoogiePL program.

Author:
Ovidio Mallo

Method Detail

transformLoops

private BPLImplementationBody transformLoops(BPLImplementationBody body)
Transforms all the loops in the given BoogiePL implementation body and returns a new implementation body resulting from this transformation.

Parameters:
body - The BoogiePL implementation body whose loops should be transformed.
Returns:
A new implementation body resulting from the transformation.

transformBlock

private BPLBasicBlock transformBlock(ControlFlowGraph cfg,
                                     BasicBlock cfgBlock)
Transforms the BoogiePL basic block contained in the given cfgBlock. The concrete set of transformations applied to every basic block depends on some of its properties and is defined as follows:
  • If the given cfgBlock is a loop header block, a havoc command is inserted at the beginning of the block for all the loop targets of all the loops starting at the given cfgBlock.
  • If the given cfgBlock is a loop header block, the assertions of the individual loop-invariants are turned into assumptions.
  • For every successor of the given cfgBlock, if that successor is a loop header block, we assert its loop invariants at the end of the BoogiePL basic block.
  • All the back edges originating from the given cfgBlock are removed.

Parameters:
cfg - The control flow graph of the current implementation body.
cfgBlock - The basic block of the control flow graph containing the BoogiePL basic block to transform.
Returns:
A new BoogiePL basic block resulting from the transformation.

getInvariants

private java.util.List<BPLExpression> getInvariants(BPLBasicBlock block)
Returns a list of expressions representing the loop invariants of the given BoogiePL block. These correspond to the expressions of all the assert commands appearing within a prefix of passive BoogiePL commands in the given BoogiePL block.

Parameters:
block - The BoogiePL block whose loop invariants to return.
Returns:
A list of expressions representing the loop invariants of the given BoogiePL block.
